name: Primary Tumor: Morphology, Location, and Characteristics
description: Detailed assessment of the primary rectal tumor's physical characteristics, position, and morphological composition.

attributes.name: Distance to the anal verge
attributes.description: The vertical distance from the lowest edge of the tumor to the anal verge, measured in centimeters.

attributes.name: Distance to the top of sphincter complex/anorectal junction
attributes.description: The distance from the tumor to the top of the sphincter complex or anorectal junction, measured in centimeters.

attributes.name: Relationship to anterior peritoneal reflection
attributes.description: The tumor's position relative to the anterior peritoneal reflection.

values.name: Above
values.description: The tumor is located above the anterior peritoneal reflection.

values.name: Straddles
values.description: The tumor straddles the anterior peritoneal reflection.

values.name: Below
values.description: The tumor is located below the anterior peritoneal reflection.

attributes.name: Craniocaudal length
attributes.description: The length of the tumor in the craniocaudal (head-to-tail) direction, measured in centimeters.

attributes.name: Tumor location
attributes.description: The location of the tumor within the rectum, categorized by distance from the anal verge.

values.name: Upper
values.description: Tumor located in the upper third of the rectum (10-15 cm from the anal verge).

values.name: Mid
values.description: Tumor located in the middle third of the rectum (5-10 cm from the anal verge).

values.name: Lower
values.description: Tumor located in the lower third of the rectum (0-5 cm from the anal verge).

attributes.name: Morphology
attributes.description: The shape and growth pattern of the tumor.

values.name: Polypoid
values.description: The tumor has a growth pattern resembling a polyp.

values.name: Annular
values.description: The tumor has a ring-like structure, encircling the rectal lumen.

values.name: Partly annular
values.description: The tumor partially forms a ring-like structure around the rectal lumen.

attributes.name: Mucinous composition
attributes.description: Indicates the presence and extent of mucin within the tumor.

values.name: No mucin
values.description: The tumor does not contain mucinous components.

values.name: Some mucin
values.description: The tumor contains a moderate amount of mucin.

values.name: Mostly mucin
values.description: The majority of the tumor consists of mucin.

name: MR-T Category
description: Magnetic Resonance Tumor (MR-T) Category describes the extent of tumor invasion as visualized on MRI.

attributes.name: Tumor visibility and extent
attributes.description: Describes the extent of tumor penetration and invasion beyond the muscularis propria.

values.name: Tx
values.description: No visible tumor or post transanal excision/polypectomy.

values.name: T1/2
values.description: Tumor confined within the rectal wall.

values.name: T3a
values.description: Tumor extends less than 1 mm beyond the muscularis propria.

values.name: T3b
values.description: Tumor extends 1-5 mm beyond the muscularis propria.

values.name: T3c
values.description: Tumor extends 5-15 mm beyond the muscularis propria.

values.name: T3d
values.description: Tumor extends more than 15 mm beyond the muscularis propria.

values.name: T4a
values.description: Tumor involves the anterior peritoneal reflection, indicated by thickening or nodularity.

values.name: T4b
values.description: Tumor
